extendedInfo.description: If you are Aerosmith's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Aerosmith's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Aerosmith's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Aerosmith's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)--------------------------------Main Features --------------------------------- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics--------------------------------List of albums --------------------------------- Aerosmith- Get Your Wings- Toys in the Attic- Rocks- Draw the Line- Night in the Ruts- Rock in a Hard Place- Done with Mirrors- Permanent Vacation- Pump- Get a Grip- Nine Lives- Just Push Play- Honkin' on Bobo- Music from Another Dimension!--------------------------------List of lyrics --------------------------------- Adam's Apple- Ain't That A Bitch- Amazing- Angel- Another Last Goodbye- Attitude Adjustment- Avant Garden- Baby, Please Don't Go- Back Back Train- Back In The Saddle- Beautiful- Beyond Beautiful- Big Ten Inch Record- Bitch's Brew- Bolivian Ragamuffin- Bone To Bone (Coney Island White Fish
